title: Butta Skin (Dorion Renaud interview)
itunes:title: Butta Skin (Dorion Renaud interview)
description:
Today on the show we had the founder and CEO of buttahskin, Dorion Renaud, stop by where he spoke about skin care, growing his business, College Hill, Beyonce and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a A Las Vegas bar for forcing a bartender who was robbed at gunpoint to repay his company the stolen money and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had the founder and CEO of buttahskin, Dorion Renaud, stop by where he spoke about skin care, growing his business, College Hill, Beyonce and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a A Las Vegas bar for forcing a bartender who was robbed at gunpoint to repay his company the stolen money and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
